#### **P+R Potence Station**

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
# Creation of time series
PRP <- as_tsibble(PRP)
PRP$weekday <- weekdays(PRP$date) # Get the weekday values
PRP$time <- as.POSIXct(PRP$date, format = "%H:%M:%S %p")
PRP$time <- as.numeric(PRP$date) #convert date values to numeric
as.numeric(PRP$time)

prp <- PRP %>% 
  mutate(minutes = time - lag(time, default = first(time))) # subtract days
prp$minutes <- as.numeric(as.character(prp$minutes))/60 # transform to minutes

# Filter the data by time difference of 10 min
prp <- prp %>% filter(minutes == 10) %>%
  select(-time,-name) %>%
  relocate(date, .before = Bike)

# Identifying the gaps on the ts and fill them
prp.gaps <- has_gaps(prp)
prp.gaps <- scan_gaps(prp)
prp <- prp %>% 
  fill_gaps(.full = TRUE) 

# Replace NA's values as previous row 
prp_ts <- prp %>%
  fill(Bike, `E-Bike`, Capacity, weekday, minutes)
scan_gaps(prp_ts) # no missing values

#  convert our data frame from wide to long format.
prp <- prp_ts %>% 
  gather("Bike", "E-Bike", "Capacity", key = Types, value = Number) %>%
  relocate(Types, .before = weekday) %>%
  relocate(Number, .before = weekday)
```

```{r}
# Time series for Wednesdays - Bike
prp_wednesdays_bike <- prp %>% 
  filter(Types == "Bike" ) %>% 
  filter(weekday == "Wednesday") %>%
  mutate(t = row_number()) %>% 
  update_tsibble(index = t, regular = TRUE)

p1 <- prp_wednesdays_bike %>% 
  autoplot() +
  geom_vline(xintercept=c(54,198,342,486,630,774,918,1062), linetype="dotted") + #Per day
  ggtitle("Wednesdays time series - Bike - P+R Potence Station") +
  labs(x = "Time [10']",
       y = "Number")

# Time series for Wednesdays - E-Bike
prp_wednesdays_ebike <- prp %>% 
  filter(Types == "E-Bike") %>% 
  filter(weekday == "Wednesday") %>%
  mutate(t = row_number()) %>% 
  update_tsibble(index = t, regular = TRUE)

p2 <- prp_wednesdays_ebike %>% 
  autoplot() +
  geom_vline(xintercept=c(54,198,342,486,630,774,918,1062), linetype="dotted") + #Per day
  ggtitle("Wednesdays time series - E-Bike - P+R Potence Station") +
  labs(x = "Time [10']",
       y = "Number")

p1 / p2
```

```{r}
# Is our time series stationary or not?
prp_wednesdays_bike %>% features(Number, unitroot_kpss) # No p-value < 0.05
prp_wednesdays_bike %>% features(Number, unitroot_ndiffs)

# Convert to stationary
prp_wednesdays_bike <- prp_wednesdays_bike %>% mutate(diff_number = difference(Number))
prp_wednesdays_bike %>% autoplot(diff_number)

# Is it white noise for the bike at the prp?
prp_wednesdays_bike %>% 
  ACF(diff_number, lag_max = 144) %>% 
  autoplot()

# Is our time series stationary or not?
prp_wednesdays_ebike %>% features(Number, unitroot_kpss) # No p-value < 0.05
prp_wednesdays_ebike %>% features(Number, unitroot_ndiffs)

# Convert to stationary
prp_wednesdays_ebike <- prp_wednesdays_ebike %>% mutate(diff_number = difference(Number))
prp_wednesdays_ebike %>% autoplot(diff_number)

# Is it white noise for the bike at the prp?
prp_wednesdays_ebike %>% 
  ACF(diff_number, lag_max = 144) %>% 
  autoplot()
```
